text: A Girl from the Chorus () is a 1937 German comedy film directed by Carl Lamac and starring Anny Ondra, Viktor Staal and Ursula Grabley.Bock & Bergfelder p. 273 It is set in the theatre world of Berlin around the turn of the twentieth century. The film's sets were designed by the art directors Wilhelm Depenau and Karl Vollbrecht. ==Cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1937 films Category:German films Category:Films of Nazi Germany Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Karel Lamač Category:German black-and-white films Category:UFA films Category:Films set in Berlin Category:Films set in the 1900s Category:1930s historical comedy films Category:German historical comedy films Category:1937 comedy films
title: A Girl from the Chorus
